slides.text: Install the chrome browser and then create a Chrome profile
SignUp to Github - the largest social network for programmers. (NOTE: check your browsers address bar to allow the signup popup for wizardamigos signup)

NEXT: (1.) learn how to manage your knowledge, (2.) learn all javascript basics, (3.) build you first webpage, (4.) build your first webapp, (5.) turn your webapp into a iphone mobile app (6.) and more...
